intro.title: Specialized company for wholesale supply of pharmaceutical products, ensuring delivery of medicines and medical devices to pharmacies and distribution networks throughout Russia and CIS countries
intro.subtitle: We work with products in the fields of ophthalmology, gastroenterology, oncology, rheumatology, nephrology, hemophilia and neurology.

list.heading: We form a targeted range of pharmaceutical products in demand specifically in specialized areas of medicine.
list.text: Instead of an extensive catalog, we ensure the supply of those drugs that are really necessary for certain therapeutic areas and have high clinical significance.

list.heading: Cooperation only with verified manufacturers and suppliers
list.text: allows us to ensure prompt and reliable delivery of necessary medicines.

list.heading: Each client is assigned a personal manager who promptly resolves work issues and helps build an uninterrupted procurement process.
list.text: This format of cooperation builds trust and contributes to stable, long-term partnerships.

list.heading: Clients throughout Russia and CIS countries value our reliability, efficiency and convenience of interaction.

questions.title: Reliable partner in ensuring product safety and quality

list.title: Guaranteed quality.
list.text: For us, the priority is the safety and quality of supplied drugs — more important than speed and commercial benefit. We work only with verified manufacturers and comply with strict control standards.

list.title: Supply stability.
list.text: The supply process is controlled by our specialists at every stage — from product preparation to its transfer to the client. This approach guarantees reliability and safety throughout the entire logistics path.

list.title: Honest terms of cooperation.
list.text: We adhere to transparent and respectful working conditions, ensuring predictability, correctness and equally high level of service for our partners.
Contact us to discuss how we can help you get the medicines you need.

questions.description: The company has a valid license for pharmaceutical activities issued by Roszdravnadzor. Upon request, we will send a confirming certificate.

products.title: Supplied Products
products.heading: In addition to competitive and transparent prices, one of the key advantages of Novyrel is the constant availability of necessary products
products.subtitle: The range of supplied products includes:
list: imported unregistered medicines supplied to Russia and CIS countries for vital indications for specific patients;
vitamins, dietary supplements and other food additives;
as well as other items available upon request.

text1: At Novyrel, we work daily with full dedication, striving to ensure maximum satisfaction of our clients' needs.
Our philosophy is based on honesty, commitment to innovation and results orientation.
We are confident: the best indicator of our work is the trust and comfort of our partners, forming strong and long-term relationships.
text2: Our mission is to simplify the path of medicines from manufacturer to patient, providing the medical community with effective solutions based on transparency, quality and responsible approach.
